GLMA01
Luigi's Mansion

Infinite Health [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
D8010150 80010154
14000008 60000000
E0000000 80008000
*Health won't increase nor decrease*
*Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rh38Co3DAA8
*Credits to Ozelot*

999.999.999 G-Points [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
807F03A8 801F03AC
D2000008 00000002
3C603B9A 6063C9FF
90660008 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*Load a profile to take effect*
*Credits to Ozelot*

F6000001 80008180

E0000000 80008000

Sudden Death [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
D8010150 80010154
14000004 38000000
E0000000 80008000
*Die immediately when health modified*

Screen Zoom Modifier [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
57E01838 EC62093A
D2000014 00000002
3D80XXXX 91840020
C0240020 00000000
E0000000 80008000
*XXXX = Float*
*3F80 = Default*
*Picture: http://s1.directupload.net/images/140316/v4s45uvu.png

Item Modifiers

Never Lose Gold Coins [Bully@Wiiplaza]
F6000001 80008180
807F07D4 809E008C
14000034 60000000
E0000000 80008000
*The counter will not decrease, but coins still drop*
